JOB DESCRIPTION: Person should be Graduate Engineer with 4+ Years of experience as  ASP.Net Software Developer . Roles and Responsibilities  Excellent Web-based Application Development using C#, ASP.NET with MVCExpert level skills in one or more of MS SQL Server and Other RDBMS systemsExpert level skills in HTML5/CSS/jQuery/AngularJS and other client-side techniquesHands-on knowledge of Visual Studio, Asp.Net applicationsExpert level skills in performance tuning for millions of records with various techniquesDatabase design including indexes and data integrityShould have worked with cloud service like AWS ServerUnderstanding of Agile methodologiesExpert level skills in debugging and troubleshooting [Client side, Server side, DB]Ability to understand third party APIs and should have knowledge of how to correctly structure those APIs in existing system.Experience with source control concepts, particularly distributed vs centralized version control and branching and mergingExperience using TFS (preferred) or any of (Git, SVN, Mercurial, Bazaar)Caching (HTML5 & CSS) at client sideDesired Candidate Profile  Self-starter with excellent verbal and communication skills and be able to work independently directly with the customer and other geographically distributed vendors/ partners involved in the project.Ability to work under pressure and to meet tight deadlinesAbility to handle multiple tasks often simultaneously
